lyrics:
6 contributorsthe cigar song lyricsverse 1
well im a sucker for fine cuban cigars
the problem is i cant afford them
but last year i went and got myself a whole box
and just to be safe i insured em

verse 2
i took out a policy against fire and theft
and then i hurried on home
and with a fiftycent lighter i sat on my back steps
and i smoked em one by one

verse 3
two weeks later i went to see that insurance man
and i handed in my claim
with a straight face i told him that through a series of small fires
theyd all gone up in flames

verse 4
they reviewed my case and they had no choice
but to pay me for what id done
i took that check and bought a whole new box
and i smoked em one by one

verse 5
two weeks later this detective shows up
and tells me that companys pressing charges
one speedy trial later they locked me up
on twentyfour separate counts of arson
see brad paisley liveget tickets as low as 55you might also likeverse 6
and now i sit and i stare at a blank brick wall
looking back on what ive done
to pass the time ive got some tencent cigars
and i smoke em one by one
yeah i smoke em one by oneembed
